last_episode_to_air.name: Save the Best for Last
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Bankses and family support Hilary during her wedding day in Martha's Vineyard; Will and Carlton work with Drew on "Blackccess."

name: Bel-Air
overview: The journey of a book smart teen whose life is forever transformed when he moves from the streets of west Philadelphia to live with his relatives in one of LA’s wealthiest suburbs.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two picks up with Will at a crossroads in his life as a new figure comes into his life who challenges what he’s learned in Bel-Air and competes for control of his influence. He juggles this while navigating his home life with the Banks family and trying to rebuild the trust that was broken at the end of last season.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Aunt Viv and Uncle Phil deal with some marital trouble, and Hilary experiences some turbulence in her love life too. Carlton and Ashley go through their own growing pains -- and self-discovery.

episodes.name: Dreams and Nightmares
episodes.overview: A talented West Philly teenager is sent to live in Bel Air to avoid the dangers of his hometown.

episodes.name: Keep Ya Head Up
episodes.overview: Will finds he doesn’t fit in at his new school; the Banks family starts to adjust to life with Will.

episodes.name: Yamacraw
episodes.overview: Will attends Uncle Phil's Black fraternity event and finds his groove with his family and peers.

episodes.name: Canvass
episodes.overview: The Banks family rallies around Uncle Phil to ramp up his campaign. Will’s past starts to catch up to him, and he finds help in an unexpected place.

episodes.name: PA to LA
episodes.overview: When Will’s friend Tray visits, his loyalty to Philly is put to the test. The Banks family supports Hilary by hosting an influencer event.

episodes.name: The Strength to Smile
episodes.overview: The Banks family supports Lisa when they host an event in memory of her mother at the mansion. Will puts his feelings of mistrust aside and steps up to the plate for the Bankses and Lisa.

episodes.name: Payback's a B*tch
episodes.overview: Will and Carlton throw a house party at the Banks mansion. When Phil unexpectedly shows up at Viv's art event, their relationship is shaken by a lack of trust. Hilary stands up to Kylo after he posts a video of her without her consent.

episodes.name: No One Wins When the Family Feuds
episodes.overview: As the Banks family celebrates Will's birthday, his mom comes to visit, causing unexpected tension. The adults consider whether it's time to tell Will about his father.

episodes.name: Can't Knock the Hustle
episodes.overview: The Banks family goes to church. Will considers taking the opportunity to find his father, unknowingly driving a wedge between Phil and Geoffrey.

episodes.name: Where To?
episodes.overview: Will’s father shows up and tells the truth about where he’s been, exposing a long-buried secret.

episodes.name: A Fresh Start
episodes.overview: Will works on being fully independent from the Banks family after a fallout with his father, Lou as Ashley celebrates her 13th birthday.

episodes.name: Speaking Truth
episodes.overview: Will alienates himself from the Bel-Air basketball team and finds appealing opportunities in love and basketball with the help of some new South LA friends.

episodes.name: Compromised
episodes.overview: When Ashley's favorite teacher is fired, Will goes to great lengths to help her out and leaves Carlton in an uncomfortable position

episodes.name: Don't Kill My Vibe
episodes.overview: After the protest, Will is suspended from the Bel-Air basketball team and looks to join an AAU team with Phil’s permission. Carlton deals with the fallout from the protest.

episodes.name: Excellence Is Everywhere
episodes.overview: Will struggles on his new basketball team but is nominated for a leadership award at Bel-Air Academy, causing friction with Carlton.

episodes.name: Let the Best Man Win
episodes.overview: Phil hosts the Banks family reunion, and Carlton works hard to impress his dad. Meanwhile, Will considers accepting the Founder’s Award nomination.

episodes.name: Under Pressure
episodes.overview: External dilemmas throw Carlton and Will off track and prevent them from fully preparing for the Founder’s Award.

episodes.name: Pursuit of Happiness
episodes.overview: Will discovers the truth about his teammate’s absence, making him question his future. Carlton spirals out of control.

episodes.name: Just Like Old Times
episodes.overview: Will confides in Phil about the shocking information he discovered regarding Doc and Zenith. Carlton struggles to keep up with all the lies he’s entangled himself in.

episodes.name: Don't Look Back
episodes.overview: The Banks family comes together for the announcement of the Founder's Award and Will embraces moving forward in an unexpected way.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two picks up with Will at a crossroads in his life as a new figure comes into his life who challenges what he’s learned in Bel-Air and competes for control of his influence. He juggles this while navigating his home life with the Banks family and trying to rebuild the trust that was broken at the end of last season.

episodes.name: Baby, I'm Back
episodes.overview: The Banks family host their annual Juneteenth festivities; Will thinks about his future.

episodes.name: Pivot
episodes.overview: Will and Carlton get jobs at the Beverly Hills Country Club and it's nothing like they expected.

episodes.name: True Colors
episodes.overview: Will and Carlton go to a downtown car event to promote "Blackccess"; Phil scopes out a new client.

episodes.name: Out All Night
episodes.overview: Will and Carlton feel the pressure of running "Blackcess"; everyone rallies around Hilary.

episodes.name: Getting Personal
episodes.overview: Viv and Phil celebrate their anniversary, but something seems off between them.

episodes.name: Baggage
episodes.overview: Will brings his parents, Vy and Lou, together to heal the past; Carlton sees a new side of Amira.

episodes.name: Black Lotus
episodes.overview: Viv and Phil spend some quality time together at a resort in Mexico; Will is stuck in a hard place between his family and chosen family.

episodes.name: Gimme a Break
episodes.overview: Will's secret participation gets revealed, putting him at odds with Carlton over what "Blackccess" truly means to each of them.

episodes.name: Family Matters
episodes.overview: Will, Carlton and Lisa try to heal after witnessing a friend's overdose; Hilary prepares for her wedding; Geoffrey reveals the truth to Frederick.

episodes.name: Save the Best for Last
episodes.overview: The Bankses and family support Hilary during her wedding day in Martha's Vineyard; Will and Carlton work with Drew on "Blackccess."

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Aunt Viv and Uncle Phil deal with some marital trouble, and Hilary experiences some turbulence in her love life too. Carlton and Ashley go through their own growing pains -- and self-discovery.
